attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public
attributes.additional_details: Every year there is always news articles stating an animal has been injured or even killed as it has had a Firework strapped to it
attributes.background: There is too many animals that get scared with fireworks and then there is people with autism that can't stand loud noises and it terrifies them. Plus you always get the irresponsible ones that throw fireworks at cars/people or even attach animals to them
